code: import React,{Component}from"react";import{BrowserRouter,Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import bookContext from"./context/BookContext";import Home from"./components/Home";import BookDetails from"./components/BookDetails";import Library from"./components/Library";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class App extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={books:[],likedBooks:[]};this.getBooks=async()=>{const url="https://freetestapi.com/api/v1/books";const options={method:"GET"};const response=await fetch(url,options);const data=await response.json();const modifiedData=data.map(each=>({...each,isLiked:false}));this.setState({books:modifiedData});};this.onClickLikeButton=id=>{const{books}=this.state;const updatedBooks=books.map(each=>{if(each.id===id){return{...each,isLiked:!each.isLiked};}return each;});const filterlikedBooks=updatedBooks.filter(each=>each.isLiked===true);this.setState({books:updatedBooks,likedBooks:filterlikedBooks});};}componentDidMount(){this.getBooks();}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(bookContext.Provider,{value:{books:this.state.books,likedBooks:this.state.likedBooks,onClickLikeButton:this.onClickLikeButton},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowserRouter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{exact:true,path:"/",Component:Home}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/books/:id",Component:BookDetails}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/library",Component:Library})]})})});}}export default App;
